people_also_ask.question: Is Chrono Trigger the best game of all time?
people_also_ask.heading: Chrono Trigger is widely regarded as the greatest RPG of all time, and for good reason. ... Even at the twilight of the SNES' lifespan, Chrono Trigger's branching narrative, colorful characters and unforgettable soundtrack were are more than enough to earn it a place on our list in this timeline or any other.
people_also_ask.title: Top 100 Video Games of All Time - IGN.com

people_also_ask.question: How many hours is Chrono Trigger?
people_also_ask.heading: When focusing on the main objectives, Chrono Trigger is about 23 Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 44½ Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: How long is Chrono Trigger? | HowLongToBeat

people_also_ask.question: Is Chrono Trigger on switch?
people_also_ask.heading: One of the most-requested additions to Nintendo Switch Online is Chrono Trigger, a game that is often considered among the greatest RPGs of all time. ... Given that its one of the highest-rated games ever, it's mind-boggling that it hasn't made an appearance on Nintendo Switch.28-Aug-2021
people_also_ask.title: 8 SNES Games that Still Need to Come to Nintendo Switch

people_also_ask.question: Is there a Chrono Trigger anime?
people_also_ask.heading: The Chrono Trigger Anime (a.k.a. Chrono Trigger OVA a.k.a. Jikū Bōken Nūmamonjaa) was a 16-minute special released exclusively at V Jump Festival in 1996 to promote Chrono Trigger. The anime begins in a strange town in a strange time. ... The Chrono Trigger Anime is a definitely must-see if you're a fan of Chrono Trigger.
